about_the_game:
A Cosmic Culinary Adventure Begins!

The fate of the universe—and its flavors—rests in your hands!

You are the one and only witch chef of Stewpendous Spoons, a intergalactic restaurant like no other. Standing before the legendary Cosmic Cauldron, your mission is to serve the most delectable stews to a host of bizarre extraterrestrial patrons. But beware—failure is not an option. If your dishes don’t satisfy... you might just become the next ingredient!

Features

  • 🔥 Deck-Building Roguelike Cooking SystemEach dish is a high-stakes gamble! With 20 different ingredients dropping into the cauldron every run, watch them collide and combine in unexpected ways to rack up points. Every cooking session introduces new ingredients, pushing you to build a strategic deck and create powerful synergies.

  • 🌌 Cosmic Cooking ChallengesBrace yourself for an intergalactic kitchen frenzy! The ingredients won’t just sit still—they’ll tumble, crash, and react in chaotic ways. Hit the target score quickly to earn bonus rewards like Cauldron Expansions and powerful Cosmic Relics that enhance your cooking prowess.

  • 🧙‍♀️ A Whimsical Witch’s TaleYour restaurant attracts customers from the farthest corners of the universe—eldritch beings with impossible demands and unrelenting appetites. If you fail to meet their expectations... well, let’s just say the consequences are cosmic-scale catastrophes.

  • ✨ Charming 2D Cosmic Pixel ArtImmerse yourself in a hand-drawn pixel-art world that’s both cute and mysterious! From animated ingredients to enchanting space backgrounds, every detail brings your cosmic kitchen to life.

Gameplay Highlights

  • 🍲 Ingredient Drop & InteractionIngredients fall randomly into the cauldron, bouncing, merging, and triggering unpredictable reactions. Adapt on the fly, strategize your deck, and make every dish a masterpiece.

  • 🃏 Strategic Deck-BuildingCollect ingredients and craft your unique deck. With a vast array of ingredient types and properties, experimenting with different combinations is key to achieving high scores and mastering the art of cosmic cuisine.

  • 🏆 Rewards & UpgradesMeet your goals to unlock cauldron upgrades and rare relics that amplify ingredient interactions. Discover faster, more efficient ways to cook and dominate the interstellar culinary scene!

Are you ready to cook up the universe’s most legendary stew? 🌠🔥

name: Kinny and the Cosmic Cauldron

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with DirectX 10, 11, or 12 support
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Cook or be cooked!In this cosmic deck-building roguelike, ingredients crash, merge, and react in chaotic ways. As the witch chef of Stewpendous Spoons, craft the perfect stew, master strategic combos, and satisfy bizarre patrons—before you end up in the cauldron yourself!
